none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2023-01-urge-nc/extracted/URGE NC/01 It's Too Late To Stop
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2023-01-urge-nc/extracted/URGE NC/04 The Way It Should Be

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 04, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
How many times did URGE NC exist in the United States? Different cities, different names. A surge in the late '70s for sure, then complete saturation by the mid 1980s. This one was from Nevada City, California and was housed on a blank tape with Pat's handwriting. Do you need it? Maybe not. Are you curious...? You know you fucking are. For what it's worth, they were pretty damn good at it. URGE NC
